tweet:
Donald Trump should resign.

In just the law few days he’s: 
 
• threatened/endorsed civil war
• threatened the Whistleblower 
• threatened Adam Schiff 

At what point do Republicans put the safety and security of the country above Donald Trump?
Amen. https://twitter.com/RepKinzinger/status/1178489464504619013 …

My statement after the House of Representatives once again voted to terminate the President’s emergency declaration—and his raid of real national security priorities—to build his border wall. ⬇️ pic.twitter.com/8efC39tpnk

On the House floor, we are once again voting to terminate @realDonaldTrump's sham emergency declaration at the border. 

But this time around, our service men and women are collateral damage in his quest to build his border wall.

That is shameful. pic.twitter.com/cWJTeibtEI
If the NRA acted a ‘foreign asset’ to Russia, why should it be allowed to stay in business? https://twitter.com/shannonrwatts/status/1177586446401716226 …
Yes, you are. https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1177182149050609664 …
I hope anyone with relevant knowledge about the conduct of the President or anyone else involved in the matters at issue will come forward to share the information he/she has.
The President is attempting to intimidate the Whistleblower and anyone else who reports his abuses of power. https://twitter.com/EliStokols/status/1177265537056989184 …

Executive privilege is not an ultimate shield against transparency. It cannot be an ultimate shield against accountability.

The President is not above the law. pic.twitter.com/dOTvMo5LMR

Just read the Whistleblower report. 

This thing is bigger that I thought.

I’m looking forward to reviewing the Whistleblower’s complaint shortly.

The transcript produced by the President shows:

- He asked for a “favor” of the Ukraine to target a political rival 
- He directed his personal lawyer to dig up dirt against that rival
-  Implicates the AG
He’d still testify.

Attorney General Barr must set aside from this investigation. 

He’s a witness that will be called testify.
“Do us a favor” - Donald Trump pressuring a foreign leader to investigate a political rival ahead of the 2020 elections. https://twitter.com/ZoeTillman/status/1176859231682793473 …
In case it wasn’t clear how I felt on this matter. #ImpeachTrump pic.twitter.com/JF6SC80pcD

The House of Rep. cannot sit idly by while this President abuses his power and tries to intimidate and coerce a foreign president into opening an investigation into his political rival. 

All of this goes beyond Dems vs. GOP, or frankly even 2020. 

Our democracy is at stake. pic.twitter.com/hDqeA74VMP

It’s time. Impeach.

 #ImpeachTrump https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1176326914723762176 …
A special thank you to @SenatorMenendez and @RepCardenas who chair our diversity task force.

Thank you to the many organizations, such as @HispanicArts @nalac_arts and @NHMC, who have been working on these issues for awhile. If you’re part of the entertainment industry and would like to share your perspective with us, please reach out at Hispanic.Caucus@mail.house.gov.

We met earlier this year with the @motionpictures MPAA and will meet in LA with heads of the major studios, including @Netflix @DisneyStudios @ParamountPics @SonyPictures @UniversalPics and @warnerbros.

The @HispanicCaucus will meet with executives in the television and film industry in Los Angeles on Nov. 7-8 about the lack of diversity and negative, unrealistic portrayal and stereotyping of Latinos in American entertainment.

Saudi Arabia is not a NATO ally and we’re not responsible for their defense. This escalation moves us closer to an unnecessary war on behalf of a country that must address its human rights abuses and its arming of terrorists.

Today we remember the 21 young people who died on September 21, 1989, in the Alton Bus Crash in Texas’ Rio Grande Valley. 

It’s one of the deadliest school bus crashes in our nation’s history. #Alton https://twitter.com/HidalgoCounty/status/1175394285405036544 …

I was honored to hear testimony from @GretaThunberg and other climate activists this week who are leading the next gen on the global climate crisis.

And yesterday at the #ClimateStrikes, once again, young people like Greta showed the adults in the room how it should be done. pic.twitter.com/HCzdz5basF

.@HouseIntel is committed to protecting this and every whistleblower who has the integrity and bravery to come forward, respect the rule of law, and report misconduct. https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1175023772375683074 …

Latino Americans are teachers, soldiers, marchers, and leaders. But most importantly, we are members of this American family – and we have been all along. #HispanicHeritageMonth pic.twitter.com/sIs13u4Qbf

Asking a foreign government to sabotage a political adversary, using military money to extort them, and once again working with a foreign government to win re-election without shame, out in the open, is a grave threat to our national security and a betrayal of our democracy. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1175159966153531392 …

It was an honor to speak at & introduce @SpeakerPelosi at the @CHCI 42nd Anniversary Gala last night. As Chairman of the @HispanicCaucus, celebrating the impact our community has made —despite ongoing attacks from this Admin — reminded me to never stop fighting for justice. pic.twitter.com/QZ4KM404xz

The storm hitting Southeast Texas is turning deadly, trapping our fellow Texans in their homes and wrecking havoc in our communities. Please be safe and heed emergency warnings from local personnel. All of Texas stands with the communities impacted. https://www.texastribune.org/2019/09/19/tropical-storm-imelda-flooding-disaster-declaration/ …

Today I re-introduced my resolution to reject @realDonaldTrump’s  emergency declaration at the border,  in light of his raid of actual national security priorities to build his ineffective wall.

This doesn’t reflect the dignity of who we are.

l’ll match this mania with might. pic.twitter.com/oa4m5oQmzr

Just intro'ed the bipartisan Transparency for Transfer Students Act, which guarantees that transfer students don't lose any credits when transferring to a new institution & provides our kids with the tools & clarity they need to make better decisions about their own education. ⬇️ pic.twitter.com/MlV4YmwxaW
Thanks, Steny! https://twitter.com/LeaderHoyer/status/1173704981872029698 …

As we celebrate this #HispanicHeritageMonth, I'm proud to be the Chairman of the largest @HispanicCaucus in Congress' history - at 38 members strong. We're all working tirelessly to uplift, protect, and empower the communities we represent. This month and always, I celebrate us. pic.twitter.com/IlNtGGY7xu
I’d be glad to try to be helpful. Can you please reach out to Roseanne Maldonado in my office in San Antonio at 210-348-8216?
Team Castro stopped by @HousingSAT's Coffee with the CEO to learn more about the programs and development initiatives that support our community. pic.twitter.com/lmMerdrFhz

This week, I participated in a @HouseForeign hearing on the tragic Amazon fires and the broader threat of deforestation to our planet. I asked questions to ensure we are holding President Bolsonaro to account for his leadership and environmental policies. #AmazonFires pic.twitter.com/0UT3IhsSwn

Yesterday, San Antonio paid tribute to the 343 fallen firefighters, 70 law enforcement, and 9 EMS who lost their lives on 9/11. Our community will always be a stronghold for those brave Americans and ensure that they are never forgotten. #NeverForget pic.twitter.com/E1rQ1ybPCS

It was great to celebrate the kick-off for the bipartisan @PreKCaucus last night, and recommit to supporting our kids and quality early learning. Many thanks to @PBSKIDS and @firstfiveyears for their continued work to bolster our children day in and day out. pic.twitter.com/0WGc42QuDC

President Trump has demonstrated a very erratic approach to national security and to foreign policy, and I think the United States is paying a price for that.

@MSNBC @VelshiRuhle pic.twitter.com/KWmUq7pMjX
Joining @VelshiRuhle @MSNBC at 1:35 ET/12:35 CT to discuss the state of American foreign affairs and Bolton's sudden departure. Tune in.

My district staff joined @SACVF at their recent Veteran Suicide Prevention Town Hall. Active Duty and Veteran suicide rates remain at an all-time high. We all need to do our part to combat this injustice facing our military families and community. pic.twitter.com/ZrhoUqe0fv

We can never forget what occurred 18 years ago on 9/11, or the bravery of all those we lost. 

We honor the victims today, and remember the heroism of the service members, first responders, and citizens who sacrificed their lives. Their memory lives on. #NeverForget

The state of American foreign policy is concerning. This revolving door on staff and a lack of stability in this Administration should deeply concern us all.

A reminder that Bolton was our 3rd nat sec advisor.

We need reliable, steady leadership.

Days before the 9/11 anniversary, instead of honoring those we lost, @realDonaldTrump invited the Taliban to the US for dinner.

He's tried to ban Muslims from our country & send Congresswomen "back to where they came from."

It's time for diplomacy over PR, respect over racism.

Trump (and his aides) have not only very publicly solicited Ukraine's help with his presidential campaign, but are using military $ in an attempt to extort them.

All of us who serve on these committees will fight for the answers the American people deserve. https://twitter.com/HouseIntel/status/1171088393213812736 …
President Trump blackmailing a foreign country to derail an American presidential opponent is yet another impeachable offense. https://twitter.com/stengel/status/1170142263881752580 …

Multiple SA military construction projects will be defunded to build @realDonaldTrump’s medieval border wall. https://woai.iheart.com/content/2019-09-05-multiple-sa-military-projects-to-be-defunded-to-build-border-wall/ …

Like so many cities across the US, my congressional district is home to 8,500 #Dreamers. They are a part of our SA community - they are our friends and neighbors. It’s been 7+ years since President Obama implemented #DACA - now it’s time for Congress to #ProtectTheDream. pic.twitter.com/41Zib0HYuv

Stealing funds from real national security priorities with the singular goal of fulfilling a xenophobic campaign promise is wrong. 

The readiness of our military and the strength of our national security does not rest on an ineffective, medieval border wall. 

More ⬇️ pic.twitter.com/xAFYFcF86f

America is defined by our working families. Let’s keep fighting for equal pay for equal work, quality healthcare, a $15 minimum wage — rights our labor unions have fought for time & again. We reaffirm & honor that commitment to hard-working Americans, today & all days. #LaborDay
